home.title: Your partner for fast and effective software development.
home.subtitle: At Everbuild, we understand that time is precious. That's why we offer you fast and effective solutions for your software development.

abt2.title: Flexible team that implements your requirements.
abt2.subtitle: We are a team of experienced designers and developers who specialize in understanding and implementing your requirements. We offer customized solutions that exceed your expectations.

card1.title: Custom development
card1.text: We develop individual software solutions that are tailored to your requirements. Our employees support you from conception to implementation.

card2.title: Managed infrastructure
card2.text: We offer you a secure and reliable infrastructure that supports your applications. Our experts take care of the maintenance and operation of your systems.

card3.title: Software-as-a-Service
card3.text: We market our own products according to a Software-as-a-Service model. With our free tiers, you can also quickly get a feel for what you're paying for - without any computing power of your own.

about.title: ABOUT US
about.title.text: At Everbuild, we specialize in unique and highly effective software solutions. Our approach combines innovation with precision and delivers customized results that redefine the digital landscape.

card1.text: Noted offers a contemporary note-taking app experience, facilitating seamless integration of pen inputs with Markdown formatting. Completely in open-source format, supported by GPU acceleration.

card2.text: Our support platform improves user satisfaction and makes troubleshooting easier for small to medium sized teams. Integrated features ensure smooth processes and community engagement.

card3.title: We ü§ù Nature
card3.text: We rely on sustainable technologies and environmentally friendly solutions to protect nature. Our products and services protect the environment and save resources. We also support non-profit environmental protection organizations with a portion of our profits.

section.title: An ambitious team with a shared goal
section.subtitle: OUR VALUES
section.text: Our values are the foundation of our corporate culture and guide our actions. We proudly integrate them into all our projects.

value1.title: Take pride in what we do
value1.text:
Value quality and integrity in everything we do. At all
times. No exceptions.

value2.title: Care about our team
value2.text: Understand what matters to our members. Give them what they need to do their best work.

value3.title: Do the impossible
value3.text: Be energized by difficult problems. Revel in unknowns. Ask "Why?", but always question, "Why not?"

text.subtitle: Customer support
text.text1.title: Customer support
text.text1.text: Our support team is available around the clock if you have any questions or problems.
text.text2.title: Feedback and suggestions
text.text2.text: We value your feedback and are constantly working to improve Everbuild. Your input is critical to shaping the future of Everbuild.
text.text3.title: Media requests
text.text3.text: For media-related questions or press inquiries, please contact us at media@everbuild.org
